dct_title_s: WERRELD-KAART, aanwyzende de koers van Mr. DAMPIERS reystogt rondom den Aardkloot van’t Jaar 1679 tot 1691
dct_description_sm: H : Moll Fecit (bottom center). Issued in: A new voyage round the world / By William Dampier. -- London : Printed for James Knapton, 1697. In English, with title: A MAP OF THE WORLD. Shewing the Course of Mr. DAMPIERS Voyage Round it: From 1679. to 1691.

In Dutch, with title: WERRELD-KAART, aanwyzende de koers van Mr. DAMPIERS reystogt rondom den Aardkloot van’t Jaar 1679 tot 1691. California unchanged and labeled California. Page 1. (top right, below title). Issued in his: Nieuwe reystogt rondom de werreld, [several volumes bound together] / In’t Engelsch beschreeven door William Dampier, en daarupt bertaald door W. Sewel. -- In’s Gravenhage : by Abraham de Hondt, 1698 [date for first section]. Final section dated 1715.

In French, with title: MAPPE - MONDE. Pag. I. (top right, inside border). Island labeled I. de Californie. Issued in his: Nouveau voyage autour du monde. Tome Premier [bound with Tome II] / Par Guillaume Dampier. -- A Amsterdam : Chez Paul Marret, M.DC.XCVIII (1698). [2],616, [4]p., 6 maps, 7 illus., 15.5 cm.

In English, with title as in State 1. H. Moll Fecit (bottom center). Damp. Voy. Vol. I. Plate 1. (lower left). To face the Title. (lower right). Issued in: A Collection of Voyages. In Four Volumes. / by William Dampier. -- London : Printed for James and John Knapton, at the Crown in St. Paul’s Church-Yard. MDCCXXIX (1729).
California with two northern indented bays. The S. of Annian is lightly drawn to the north of the island. Shows the track of Dampier’s voyage.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
